_comment: Framework Name: Novac Automation Framework | Author: SriramR-NOVAC | File Name: LoginPage.json | Description: Object repository for login page elements

elements.name: login-btn
elements.xpathValue: //button[@id='login-button' or @type='submit' or contains(@class,'login') or contains(text(),'Login') or contains(text(),'Sign In') or contains(@value,'Login')][1]
